ingredients: 1½ pounds mild Italian turkey sausage, casings removed
1 28-ounce can crushed tomatoes in tomato puree
¼ cup chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley, divided, plus more for garnish
½ cup packed, chopped fresh basil leaves
⅛ teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes (optional)
1 cup grated Pecorino Romano cheese, plus ¼ cup for sprinkling (Parmesan can be substituted)
